[event]
# Teleport to Laurelia
type=event
location=13,16,2,1
activate=on_trigger
intermap=maps/laurelia.txt,24,92

[event]
# On Ghosts
type=event
location=6,8,1,1
activate=on_trigger
hotspot=location
msg=p.32: "Ghosts, being incorporeal, are nearly immune to heat and fire."
repeat=false
tooltip=On Ghosts

[event]
# History
type=event
location=4,11,1,1
activate=on_trigger
hotspot=location
msg=p.1:  "This small town is a seeming backwater.  However, nearly every one of it's citizens has the ability to polymorph into another creature."  Better put it back on the top shelf where the tourists can't find it.
repeat=false
tooltip=History of Laurelia

[event]
# Demonology
type=event
location=17,11,1,1
activate=on_trigger
hotspot=location
msg=p. 967: "Zalkas was constantly beset by paladins seeking to destroy them; he would eliminate each one by blotting out the light with flocks of bats."
repeat=false
tooltip=Deomonology
